metadata.title: Piel Leather Double Loop Flap-Over Laptop Backpack, Black, One Size
features: Double loop magnetic snap opens flap to reveal a large front zip compartment with a full organizer. Spacious main compartment with drawstring closure complete with a padded laptop pocket, two open pockets for accessories, and a interior zip-pocket. Gusseted zip compartments on each side, plus an open pocket on the right. Double padded adjustable backpack straps, back vertical zip-pocket, front zip-pocket on flap, and an easy carry handle on top
Full grain genuine leather, made from full grain cowhide
Leather improves with age as it absorbs the oils from your hands and assumes a classic, worn look
description: Double loop magnetic snap opens flap to reveal a large front zip compartment with a full organizer.
